job.title: Mortgage Referral Executive  (5-day work)
job.abstract: This position provides candidate with opportunities in developing career / professional in mortgage and financial services field.
job.content:
Centaline Mortgage Broker Limited (CMB), established in 1997, is a member of The
Centaline Group (中原集團).

With the aim of providing high-quality mortgage referral service for
years. CMB provides courteous mortgage referral services to our clients for
FREE. We are able to arrange property valuation, mortgage pre-approval and
express mortgage approval service for FREE to our clients. We strive to
introduce the most favorable mortgage plans to our clients as per their
different needs or investment strategies.

 

Join us and be a part of our exciting growth!
 

 

Job Responsibilities:

 * Handle mortgage / loan referral applications and enquiries;
 * Facilitate coordination with banking partners, customers and property agents
   for business acquisition opportunities;
 * Advise customers of the most suitable mortgage plans as per their needs;
 * Participate in tactical promotion activities.

 
Job Requirements:

 * DSE Graduate / F.7 or above;
 * 1 year working experience in banking or mortgage referral industry is
   preferred; 
 * Sales / Customer Service experience in mortgage/ loan service is preferable;
 * Self-motivated, independent and service centric;
 * Good interpersonal & communications skills;
 * Proficiency in Chinese, English and Putonghua
 * Candidates with less experience will be considered as Assistant Mortgage
   Referral Executive.

 

 

We offer excellent career opportunities and competitive remuneration package to
the right candidates.  Please promptly send your CV with current and
expected salary by clicking “APPLY".

location.label: Tsim Sha Tsui, Yau Tsim Mong District

bullets: Member of The Centaline Group Mortgage / Loan / Financial Services
Application Referral & Enquiries / Facilitate Business Acquisition Opportunities
Basic Salary with Commission / Monthly Bonus / Friendly & Vibrant Environment

job.title: AIGC Engineer
job.abstract: The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing large-scale language models to enhance our AI capabilities.
job.content:
We are a cutting-edge technology innovation company dedicated to exploring the
endless possibilities of artificial intelligence and digital entertainment. By
integrating the latest AI technology with creative content production, we are
shaping a new form of future entertainment experience. Currently, we are looking
for a talented AIGC Engineer specializing in digital human technology to embark
on a new chapter of interactive content creation for the next generation.

Responsibilities:

 * Technical Leadership and Innovation: In-depth research and application of the
   latest AIGC technology, especially 2D and 3D model generation technology, to
   design and implement highly realistic and interactive digital humans.
 * Model Optimization and Implementation: Optimize existing 2D/3D models to
   enhance rendering efficiency and visual effects, ensuring smooth performance
   of digital humans across different platforms.
 * Cross-Disciplinary Integration: Explore new boundaries of digital humans in
   sound interaction and emotional expression by combining sound processing and
   music production technologies to enhance the realism of user experience.
 * Project Collaboration: Collaborate closely with product, design, and audio
   teams to drive the entire process of digital human projects from concept to
   finished product, ensuring timely and high-quality project completion.
 * Technical Innovation and Sharing: Stay updated on industry trends,
   continuously learn new technologies, regularly share research findings, and
   drive the continuous improvement of the team's technical capabilities.

Requirements:

 * Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or
   related fields, with a solid foundation in computer graphics and artificial
   intelligence.
 * At least 3 years of relevant work experience, with priority given to those
   who have successfully participated in 2D/3D model development projects in the
   digital human, gaming, or film industries.
 * Proficiency in at least one mainstream 3D modeling and animation software
   (such as Maya, 3ds Max, Blender, etc.), familiarity with game engines like
   Unity or Unreal Engine.
 * Some understanding of sound processing technology, with experience in audio
   synthesis and sound design being a plus.
 * Familiarity with programming languages like Python, C++, and experience using
   deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch.
 * Excellent teamwork spirit, good communication skills, and the ability to
   quickly learn new technologies.

bullets: Design and optimize large language models
Degree or higher in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Mathematics
Proven experience in developing and deploying large language models

job.title: International Industry Research
job.abstract: A great opportunity to build a world-class information service and technology innovation company！
job.content:
China Mobile (Hong Kong) Innovation Research Institute Company Limited was
established in 2024. It is a group-level research and development institution
that undertakes three major functions: inward, outward, and international
integration. The Hong Kong Innovation Institute will leverage Hong Kong's role
as a bridge, strengthen the coordination among Guangdong, Hong Kong, and Macau,
start from Hong Kong, strategically position itself, actively integrate into the
global innovation system, promote the company's core capabilities and products
to "go global," gather top global innovative talents, carry out high-quality
international scientific and technological cooperation, enhance the company's
international scientific and technological innovation influence, and contribute
to building a world-class information service and technology innovation company.

Responsibilities:

1. Responsible for the collection, investigation, tracking, analysis and
research of international technological developments such as mobile information
and AI, and completed the writing and release of relevant white papers and
industry research reports;
2. Responsible for obtaining relevant hot information, mining scientific and
technological cooperation opportunities, technology and industry analysis and
judgment in key regions such as Hong Kong, Asia-Pacific and the Belt and Road,
forming relevant technology and industry insight reports, and putting forward
strategic suggestions for the company's technology development;
3. Responsible for organizing and promoting international innovation cooperation
projects, and promoting extensive exchanges and sharing of international
cutting-edge technologies;
4. Complete other tasks assigned by leaders.

Requirements:

1. Bachelor degree or above, professional direction or working background in
mobile communication, AI, cloud computing, computing chip and other fields is
preferred;
2. Have a deep understanding of international cutting-edge technology and
industrial development trends, master market and industry investigation and
analysis methods, and have the ability to systematically formulate cooperation
and expansion strategies and put forward development suggestions;
3. Skilled in external contact, communication, negotiation and other skills,
with international operators, industries, cross-industry cooperation and
development capabilities;
4. Fluent in English listening, speaking, reading and writing, able to
communicate effectively with partners in English.

bullets: Integrate into the global innovation system
Building a world-class information service and technology innovation company

job.title: Assistant Warehouse Manager
job.abstract: We are looking for a leadership with art handling and warehousing experience and strong management and leadership capability
job.content:
The role: 

 

This role manages the art handler team of 5+ staff, responsible for warehousing,
property handling, logistics planning and execution for exhibitions and
auctions. This role requires strong art handling experience and strong people
management skills for effective collaboration with internal stakeholders (i.e.,
saleroom operations, security, services operations, and specialist departments
etc.) and external stakeholders (i.e., suppliers and clients), to deliver
seamless logistics for warehouse operations, exhibitions and auctions. It is
essential that the person taking this role has a supportive attitude and is
willing to provide mentorship to the art handler team to drive performance,
operation efficiency and ensure excellent client experience in warehouse and
logistics operations.

 

Key responsibilities (Not limited to the following):

 

Team Management 

 * Manage and supervise the art handler team of 5+ staff, provide art handling
   support and supervision in the warehouse. 
 * Point of escalation for art handlers, support them to deal with difficult
   case and solve problem. 
 * Train and develop the team on art handling knowledge i.e., packing, framing,
   installation etc.
 * Prioritize health, safety and wellness in the warehouse. 
 * Foster a collaborative and positive work environment, cultivate art handler
   team development, set KPIs and objectives and manage individual development. 

 

Warehouse Operations:

 * Supervise the warehouses operations in the office and offsite location which
   is operated by our 3rd party supplier.
 * Work closely with the Inventory Team to conduct physical stock take as
   required.
 * Develop and implement efficient process to streamline and standardize
   warehouse operations, storage space organization, handling and packing
   standard.
 * Conduct regular review with 3rd party warehouse suppliers against KPIs,
   ensure they provide services up to Christie’s standard.
 * Report any damages, losses or discrepancies immediately to the Manager,
   responsible to investigate and conduct incident report, work closely with the
   Manager to debrief and resolve the case.

 

Sale and Exhibitions Logistics:

 * Appropriate manpower planning in support of installation and de-installation,
   timely move in and out of our gallery. 
 * Work closely with internal team and other departments, including specialists,
   saleroom operations, security and customer service, to support preview setups
   & dismantle, and property release to clients.
 * Oversee the jib operations for load-in and out of oversized artwork in our
   gallery. 
 * Support projects and new initiatives as assigned by the manager.

 

Qualification Requirements: 

 * Completion of tertiary education with minimum 5 years of industry and
   supervisory experience.
 * Strong and solid knowledge of logistics, including art handling and
   warehousing; luxury handling is an advantage.
 * Excellent communication and interpersonal skills; demonstrated ability to
   communicate with all organizational levels.
 * Abilities to multi-task, work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
 * Strong leadership skills of people management, coaching and training.
 * Effective verbal and written English and Chinese (including Mandarin).
 * Proficiency in Microsoft Offices, prior experience with ERP system is an
   advantage.
 * Flexibility to work overtime and weekend hours when required.

bullets: Must have management and leadership capability

paragraphs: World’s Leading Auction House

Christie’s is a name and place that speaks of extraordinary art, unparalleled service and expertise, as well as international glamour. Founded in 1766 by James Christie, Christie's has since conducted the greatest and most celebrated auctions through the centuries providing a popular showcase for the unique and the beautiful. Christie’s offers over 450 auctions annually in over 80 categories, including all areas of fine and decorative arts, jewellery, photographs, collectibles, wine, and more. Prices range from $200 to over $100 million. Christie’s, the world's leading art business, had global auction and private sales. Our sales figures were driven by an increase in new buyers across all geographies coming to the market, including from growth markets such as China and through the Internet. Christie's also has a long and successful history conducting private sales for its clients in all categories.

Christie’s has a global presence with 53 offices in 32 countries and 10 salerooms around the world including in London, New York, Paris, Geneva, Milan, Amsterdam, Dubai, Zürich, and Hong Kong. More recently, Christie’s has led in growth markets such as Russia, China, India and the Middle East, with successful sales, exhibitions and initiatives in Shanghai, Moscow, Baku, Beijing, Mumbai, Delhi, Jeddah, Abu Dhabi, Doha and Dubai.

job.title: ASSISTANT PROPERTY OFFICER (Residential, Lam Tin)
job.abstract: Working Location: Lam Tin
job.content:
Harriman Property Management Limited (PMC Licence Number: C-761006), a
wholly-owned subsidiary of Wheelock Properties, is a leading property management
company in Hong Kong. With a history spanning over 55 years, our commitment to
quality service has been recognized through numerous industry accolades, awards
and ISO certifications. As part of the Wheelock Properties’ family, Harriman is
currently managing across 35 diverse projects, ranging from residential
properties to a variety of contemporary offices.

Responsibilities:

 * Act as the second-in-charge to oversee the day-to-day management of a newly
   developed residential estate
 * Duties include budget planning, enforcement of DMC, liaison with owners /
   tenants, complaints handling, supervision of site staff and monitoring of
   contractors’ performance, etc

Requirements: 
 

 * Diploma or above in Property / Housing Management or related disciplines 
 * Holder of PMP License (Tier2) is preferred
 * Mature, independent and able to work under pressure
 * Possess good PC skills and knowledge in Chinese Word Processing
 * Proficiency in both written and spoken English and Chinese is required

paragraphs: Founded in 1984 by Group Chairman & CEO Dr. Jimmy Tang MH JP, Prince Jewellery & Watch has developed its progressive business expansion with 16 branches in Hong Kong.

With its flagship store located in Prestige Tower in Tsimshatsui, Prince Jewellery & Watch is renowned for carrying many international watch brands, such as Cartier, FRANCK MULLER, Chopard, Omega, Breguet, Longines, Carl F. Bucherer, Parmigiani Fleurier, etc.

Apart from carrying some of the greatest watch brands in the world, Prince also boosts a wide variety of yellow gold, 18K white gold, rose gold, platinum, yellow and pink diamond, and precious stones jewellery collection of exquisite and elegant design.

job.title: Technology - SAP Consultant - Manager (FICO/ Finance)
job.abstract:
Let there be CHANGE
Ready to fast-track your career? Ready to solve complex problems? Advance your skills? Deliver next-generation technology...
job.content:
Let there be CHANGE

Ready to fast-track your career? Ready to solve complex problems? Advance your
skills? Deliver next-generation technology solutions? Join Accenture and help
transform leading organizations and communities around the world. Working in
highly collaborative teams for world-leading clients, we’ll nurture your talent
in an inclusive

Your career is about what you want to be and who you want to be. It’s about
bringing your skills, your curiosity and your best true self to your work.

Here, you’ll match your ingenuity with the latest technology to make incredible
things. Let’s create something together.

 

You can enjoy:

 * Comprehensive Medical (24-hour worldwide) coverage, including your spouse/
   life partner and children!
 * Dental insurance, Life insurance, Total and perm disability, accidental death
   & dismemberment insurance!
 * Vision care benefits, Health check, Housing benefits!
 * Purchase of Accenture stocks at attractive discount!
 * Reimbursement of Professional Membership costs
 * Professional training and career advancement opportunities!
 * Valuable project exposure for different technologies and industry domains!

When you work with us, change becomes the most dynamic, powerful source of
progress you have!

 

Job duties of this Role:

 * Involve in project implementation, business requirements analysis, business
   process design, SAP system design and configuration, system testing and user
   training and go-live support
 * Gathering user requirement, translating functional document into technical
   specification
 * Ability to analyze business problems and provide technical advice

 

 Come JOIN US if you have:

 * Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Finance or related
   disciplines
 * At least 3 years hands-on experience and 1 full cycle in SAP Projects
   Implementation (FI Modules)
 * Experience in business requirements analysis, business process design, SAP
   system design and configuration, system testing and user training and go-live
   support
 * Independent, self-motivated and able to work under pressure
 * Good command of English and Mandarin
 * Consulting background is preferred, while in-house candidate will also be
   considered
 * Immediate available is preferred

Note: 2 Headcounts - 1 Consultant & 1 (Asso.) Manager

bullets: Full cycle in SAP Projects Implementation
Medical, Life Insurance, Medical Check Up

paragraphs: Accenture is a leading global professional services company that helps the world’s leading businesses, governments and other organizations build their digital core, optimize their operations, accelerate revenue growth and enhance citizen services—creating tangible value at speed and scale. We are a talent and innovation-led company serving clients in more than 120 countries. We combine our strength in technology and leadership in cloud, data and AI with unmatched industry experience, functional expertise and global delivery capability. We measure our success by the 360° value we create for our clients, each other, our shareholders, partners and communities.

job.title: Assistant Manager, Business Account Acquisition
job.abstract: Reporting to Senior Manager, Business Banking Acquisition, you are expected to eplore new business opportunities in SME segment
job.content:
Reporting to Senior Manager, Business Banking Acquisition, you are expected to
eplore new business opportunities in SME segment to generate lending businesses
and revenues for the Bank.

Responsibilities: 

 * Work towards KPI target by acquiring new SME account and CASA deposit
   balance.
 * Build and manage sales pipeline effectively by generating new leads from own
   network and working closely with branches to identify SME loan opportunities.
 * Conduct need assessment to map suitable financial products/service to meet
   customers’ needs and identify up-selling and cross-selling opportunities for
   SME and Retail Banking Business.
 * Follow through the whole loan application process, from application
   submission to loan drawdown.
 * Ensure KYC/CDD compliance for all new to bank and existing customers and
   exercise risk assessment for new customers by following all necessary
   procedure of KYC.
 * Prepare credit proposal and conduct regular review to ensure credit quality
   by following the Bank’s policy and procedures.
 * Comply with customer data protection, regulatory conduct, compliance
   requirements and practices as defined by internal and external requirements.
 * Achieve and maintain excellent service quality to SME Business Banking
   customer and handle customer enquiries in a professional way to ensure a high
   level of customer satisfaction

Incumbent Requirements:

 * University degree in business Management/ Finance/ Related disciplines
   preferred.
 * Minimum 2 years’ experience in business banking, relevant experience in
   commercial lending or SME lending advantageous.
 * Sound knowledge in commercial credit, product and services with strong
   compliance mindset.
 * Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, analytical and communication skills.
 * Self-motivated, resilience, customer-centric, with good teamwork spirit.
 * Proficiency in both English and Chinese, fluency in Putonghua is an
   advantage.
 * Relevant insurance licensing (IIQE Paper 1, 2, 3) advantageous.

Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

bullets: Build and manage sales pipeline effectively
University degree in business Management/ Finance
Minimum 2 years’ experience in business banking

job.title: SENIOR PROPERTY OFFICER / PROPERTY OFFICER
job.abstract: Savills has a network of over 700 offices and associates throughout the Americas, Europe, Asia Pacific, Africa and the Middle East. We require a...
job.content:
Savills has a network of over 700 offices and associates throughout the
Americas, Europe, Asia Pacific, Africa and the Middle East. We require a high
calibre individual to join us for the following position:- 

 


SENIOR PROPERTY OFFICER 1 PROPERTY OFFICER

 

 * Responsible for assisting the property manager to look after a residential
   property in Tsing Yi District
 * Relevant professional qualifications in property management. PMP
   Licence/M.H.K.l.S./M.C.l.H. an advantage
 * At least 1 year of working experience in related field and in similar
   capacity
 * Strong interpersonal skill is required
 * Good command of written and spoken English and Chinese
 * Mature and able to work independently

 

We offer attractive remuneration and excellent prospects for the right candidate
Please apply in writing with full resume and salary expected to below address or
click “APPLY NOW”

job.title: Administrative Assistant (Temporary Appointment)
job.abstract: The appointee will be required to provide administrative and operational support to the daily operation of the general office.
job.content:
DEPARTMENT OF CHINESE HISTORY AND CULTURE

Administrative Assistant (Temporary Appointment) (Ref. 241003009)

[Appointment period: twelve months] 

Duties 

The appointee will be required to: 

(a) provide administrative and operational support to the daily operation of the
general office;

(b) perform counter duties and to handle enquiries and phone calls;

(c) provide support in organising seminars, workshops and promotional events;

(d) assist in handling financial matters of the Department;

(e) provide support in filing and report compilation; and

(f) perform any other duties as assigned by the Head of Department or his/her
delegates. 

Qualifications

Applicants should: 

(a) have five passes in HKCEE including English Language (at least Grade C if
Syllabus A; Level 2 if results are obtained from 2007 onwards), Chinese Language
(Level 2 if results are obtained from 2007 onwards) and Mathematics; or a
combination of results in five HKDSE subjects of Level 2 in New Senior Secondary
subjects / “Attained” in Applied Learning subjects / Grade E in Other Language
subjects, and the five subjects must include English Language, Chinese Language
and Mathematics;

(b) have some relevant administrative experience, preferably gained from
education sector;

(c) be able to communicate in both written and spoken English and Chinese,
preferably with fluency in Putonghua;

(d) have good computer literacy, including MS Word, Excel and Chinese word
processing; and

(e) have multi-tasking skills and good interpersonal skills.

Conditions of Service 

A highly competitive remuneration package will be offered.  

Application 

Please submit an application through PolyU’s career website
(https://jobs.polyu.edu.hk/general).  Consideration of applications will
commence on 17 October 2024 until the position is filled. The University’s
Personal Information Collection Statement for recruitment can be found at
https://www.polyu.edu.hk/hro/careers/pics_for_recruitment/.

PolyU is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusivity. 
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without
regard to gender, ethnicity, nationality, family status or physical or mental
disabilities.

job.title: Analyst Programmer - (REF. NO.: HKEC241010)
job.abstract:
Pay: HK$41,484 to HK$63,338 (HGPS Point 17 to 26) per month including Monthly Allowance 
Up to 15% of total basic salary as end-of-contract gratuity
job.content:
Department / Cluster: Information Technology Division / Hong Kong East Cluster
Pay:    HK$41,484 to HK$63,338 (HGPS Point 17 to 26) per month including Monthly
Allowance 
Up to 15% of total basic salary (after deducting the contribution of Mandatory
Provident Fund by Hospital Authority) as end-of-contract gratuity may be offered
to contract staff upon completion of the contract subject to satisfactory
performance.

Key Responsibilities:
1.   Conduct detail system analysis, problem diagnosis, propose, develop and
implement IT solutions.
2.   Assist in provision of consultancy based on information technology and
industry expertise in areas of responsibility.
3.   Prepare requirement specifications of IT solutions in areas of
responsibility.
4.   Monitor service provision of IT solutions in areas of responsibility.
5.   Provide competent level of user support.
6.   Prepare cases for testing IT solutions in areas of responsibility.
7.   Maintain system documentations and reports of IT solutions in areas of
responsibility.
8.   Prepare user guide and conduct user training.
9.   Provide proficient configuration, testing, technical operational or user
support on system hardware, software or services in the areas of responsibility.
10. Monitor systems connectivity, performance and security control in the areas
of responsibility.
11. Implement technical infrastructure enhancements such as network, computer
platform, desktop computer and data centre, etc.
12. Quality assurance and accept work deliverables from IT staff.
13. Provide after office hours system support and carry 24-hour mobile phone for
support duty.
14. Perform any other duties as assigned by supervisors.

Entry Requirements:
1.  Degree in Computer Science or relevant disciplines; or equivalent.
2.  4 years' post qualification Information Technology (IT) related experience.*
*Relevant experience gained in HA may be considered as equivalent to
post-qualification experience.

Preferred Attributes:
1.   Experience in PC, mobile device, server and network infrastructure support.
2.   Experience in technical operation support.
3.   Good knowledge of IT service management and project implementation.
4.   Good command of both spoken and written English and Cantonese.
5.   Self-initiated, self-motivated and able to work independently.
6.   Good interpersonal, communication and supervisory skills.

Remarks:
1.  Please refer to https://www.ha.org.hk/haho/ho/hrd_jv/NotestoApplicants.pdf
for “Notes to Applicants”.
2.   One of the posts is a time-limited post. The selected candidate will be
offered contract or fixed-term appointment for up to 3 years.
Please submit on-line application on or before 15 October 2024. 
For enquiries, please telephone 2595 6967.

job.title: Designer, Publications
job.abstract: In uniting with SR, you’ll be joining a family of brand strategists, sustainability change-makers, creatives, and digital architects going places.
job.content:
The Role

An opportunity to join a well-established creative studio within a growing brand
and sustainability consultancy.

The role is focused on design development for printed and digital publications,
including sustainability and annual reports, taking these through to final
production.

You love layout and typography design with an eye for the details. 

You understand information hierarchies and have a talent for visual information
design.

You’re collaborative and reliable.

If this sounds like you, join our friendly creative team based in Central
working for some of the top listed companies in Hong Kong and overseas markets.

 

Responsibilities

Working alongside the creative director and design director, and supported by a
dedicated production team, your primary responsibility is the design of printed
and digital reports including:

 * Development and visualisation of concepts through to layout and final
   production.
 * Supervision of suppliers such as illustrators, photographers, printers.
 * Attending printing press checks to ensure quality standards.
 * Assist in art direction of photography.
 * Developing SR brand assets for marketing.
 * Helping polish sales presentations for maximum impact.
 * Assisting in the development of brand identity systems and design guidelines.
 * You will also have opportunity to lead creative on projects. This requires
   you have the skills necessary to manage both yourself and other designers,
   mentoring and inspiring juniors, from beginning of the project to completion.

 

About You 

 * A recognised graphic or visual design qualification.
 * Minimum two years’ experience in a design environment.
 * Calm and patient under pressure of deadlines, you can work quickly and
   accurately.
 * Publications design experience, including sustainability and/or financial
   annual reports, printed and online.
 * Eager to learn new design tools to ‘work smart’ and focus on the key design
   challenges.
 * Good communication skills with fluency in English and Chinese, able to handle
   bi-lingual designs.
 * You have intimate working knowledge of Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, In
   Design, After Effects, Figma. Cinema 4D is a good plus.

 

What We Offer

 * Some hybrid flexibility to organize where you work.
 * A supportive, coaching culture. You grow, we grow.
 * Like-minded colleagues committed to sustainability and walking the talk.

 

Why Join Us

Headquartered in Asia for over 30 years, Sedgwick Richardson (‘SR’) is a brand
and sustainability consultancy.  We work with visionary leaders and
entrepreneurs across East and Southeast Asia to build brands that create value
for business, society, and the environment.

We believe the adaptation and regeneration are integral to business resilience,
growth, and sustainability.  Brands that are credibly contributing to a better
world will prosper. 

In uniting with SR, you’ll be joining a family of brand strategists,
sustainability change-makers, storytellers, creatives, and digital architects
going place. 

 

Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

At SR, we believe an equitable and inclusive work environment—where everyone
feels valued and respected—is the foundation for delivering on our purpose. We
seek candidates who fit into our culture and who can expand our horizons,
challenge the status quo, and innovate to create Shared Value. 

 

To Apply

If this sounds like you, please send us (join@sedgwick-richardson.com) a short
email explaining why you’re ready to build belief in the future along with your
résumé.

bullets: Learn how to build purposeful brands

job.title: Business Development Manager, APAC
job.abstract: We are currently expanding our business in the Indonesian community and we have been building a financial product for the Indonesian sector.
job.content:
Sirius Capital Holdings Limited is a Hong Kong limited company, which aims to
provide a wide range of investment products for our customers.

 

Responsibilities:

We are currently expanding our business in the Indonesian community and we have
been building a financial product for the Indonesian sector. We are looking for
high calibrate candidate with deep understanding of Indonesian culture and
people to join our team who possesses the following attributes:

 

 * Responsible for developing, implementing, and executing marketing strategies
   and campaigns for Hong Kong and APAC
 * Analyse customer insights and trends, market analysis and conditions to build
   successful strategies
 * Execute marketing plans, campaigns, and strategies to meet objectives for all
   marketing related activities
 * Manage marketing budget to achieve effective marketing activities
 * Report and communicate with top management about marketing programs,
   strategies, and budgets
 * Drive sales to increase company’s revenue
 * Good presentation, communication, and customer servicing skills
 * Fluent in English and Bahasa
 * Immediately available

 

Skills which will be of value:

 

 * Proven success in developing marketing plans and campaigns
 * Experience of Marketing and Client Relations
 * Strong project management, multitasking, and decision-making skills

job.title: Manager, Digital Business, Partnership Distribution
job.content:
What the role is?

 

Lead Generation Platform Development

 * Design and implement a robust lead generation platform to attract potential
   partners and clients.
 * Utilize digital marketing tools and technologies to optimize lead generation
   processes.
 * Experiment with new approaches and tools to improve lead quality and
   conversion rates.

 

Market Analysis

 * Conduct market research to identify trends, opportunities, and competitive
   landscape in the life insurance market.
 * Analyze data and metrics to refine lead generation strategies and improve
   conversion rates.

 

Digital Marketing Strategy

 * Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns to promote partnership
   distribution initiatives.
 * Leverage social media, email marketing and other digital channels to reach
   target audiences.

 

Collaboration and Coordination

 * Work closely with sales, marketing, and IT teams to ensure alignment and
   support for partnership distribution goals.
 * Coordinate training and resources for partners to maximize their
   effectiveness in lead generation.

 

Performance Monitoring

 * Track and report on the performance of lead generation efforts, providing
   insights and recommendations for improvement.
 * Set and monitor KPIs to measure the effectiveness of digital marketing
   initiatives.

 

What we look for?

 

 * Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.
 * Minimum of 8 years of experience in digital marketing, partnership
   development, or lead generation, preferably in the insurance industry.
 * Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make
   data-driven decisions.
 * Proficient in digital marketing tools and platforms, including CRM systems
   and social media
 * Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build
   relationships at all levels.
 * Self-motivated, results-driven, and able to work independently as well as
   part of a team.

 

 

Personal Information Collection Statement

 

At Chow Tai Fook Life Insurance Company Limited (“the Company”) we respect the
privacy of your personal data and are committed to fully complying with the
Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance (“the Ordinance”).

 

The personal data that we collect and/or hold (whether contained in this
application form or otherwise obtained) includes your personal details, contact
information, education and training details, employment details, financial
details, and information on your social circumstances.

 

Provision of personal data by you is mandatory for selection purposes. Personal
data collected through this application will be used by the Company to assess
your suitability to assume the job duties of the position for which you have
applied. The Company may not be able to process your application if you fail to
provide your personal data.

 

Applicants not contacted within four weeks after the interview / test may
consider their application unsuccessful. The information provided will be kept
for 2 years for consideration of other suitable posts.

paragraphs: Chow Tai Fook Life Insurance Company Limited (Incorporated in Bermuda with limited liability; “CTF Life” is proud of its rich, nearly 40-year legacy in Hong Kong. CTF Life is a wholly-owned subsidiary of NWS Holdings Limited and one of the most well-established life insurance companies in Hong Kong. As a member of Chow Tai Fook Enterprises Limited, CTF Life consistently strengthens its collaboration with the diverse conglomerate of the Cheng family (“Chow Tai Fook Group” or “the Group”) to support customers and their loved ones in navigating life’s journey with personalised planning solutions, lifelong protection and diverse lifestyle experiences.

job.title: Application Developer I FinTech I 35,000 HKD
job.abstract: Join a leading fintech firm as an Application Developer! Work on mission-critical systems, enjoy competitive salary, and growth opportunities.
job.content:
Our client, a leading financial technology firm, is seeking an Application
Developer. This company is dedicated to enhancing the trading experience through
advanced technology and data-driven insights. With a strong commitment to
excellence and a focus on customer satisfaction, they are at the forefront of
the fintech industry, delivering mission-critical systems that empower traders
and investors.

 

Key Responsibilities

 * Work in a fast-paced environment to deliver mission critical trading systems;
 * Participate in development, testing and implementation of finance
   applications;
 * Depends on experience and skills, candidates will be assigned to projects
   including but not limited to server-side development, front-end (web, desktop
   and mobile Apps) development;
 * Prepare test scripts and data, and participate in system tests;
 * To investigate, troubleshoot and resolve production issues; and
 * Prepare documentations, e.g. system specifications and test cases.

Required Experience/Skills

 * Bachelor's Degree holder in Computer Science or a related discipline.
 * Minimum of 2 years of experience as a software developer.
 * Experience with the following technologies:
   Must-Have: Java or ReactJS
   Preferred: Spring, React Native, Next.js, SQL
 * Understanding of OOP: Knowledge of object-oriented programming and
   multi-threaded application design is a plus.
 * Proficient in Cantonese, conversational English and Mandarin

What We Offer

 * A competitive Salary Package: Ca. 35,000 HKD
 * Health Insurances
 * Innovative Environment
 * Professional Development
 * Growth opportunities

job.title: (Assistant) Key Account Manager
job.abstract: A leading FMCG group that has achieved success in marketing and distributing its products across Hong Kong and China is currently seeking a (A)KAM.
job.content:
About Our Client
Our client is one of the leading FMCG group in Hong Kong. The brands have
successfully marketed and distributed their products throughout Hong Kong and
the Greater China region. To sustain the group's continuous development, they
are looking for an (Assistant) Key Account Manager to join their team.


Responsibility

 * Manage and expand relationships with existing key accounts, focusing on the
   creation of incremental demand in the marketplace by utilising customer and
   market insights, and proactively identifying further new business
   opportunities
 * Lead a team and execute promotion strategies and sales initiatives to achieve
   the sales target
 * Monitor competitor activities and perform regular analysis; To implement
   appropriate sales strategies and reinforce company competency
 * Develop annual business plan targets and ensure they are followed through and
   achieved, make sure necessary adjustments are made timely according to market
   condition
 * Manage customer negotiations in relation to the company's commercial strategy
   and the customer trading terms
 * Bridge the gap between the customers and internal teams by delivering
   feedback and suggestions to each party



Requirements:

 * Degree holder in Business Administration or related disciplines
 * A minimum of 5 years' working experience in FMCG industries, familiar with
   Modern Trade/Key Accounts Management
 * Energetic, well-organized, proactive and able to work independently.
 * Good communication and interpersonal skills.
 * Strong business vision with strong interpersonal & communication skills
 * Good command of written and spoken English and Chinese

Click "Apply Now" to apply for this position or call Andy Lo at +852 3180 4937
for a confidential discussion. All information collected will be kept in strict
confidence and will be used for recruitment purpose only.

bullets: Double Pay, 5-day work, up to 600K. p.a.

job.title: Warehouse Operations Officer
job.abstract: Manage daily warehouse operations and system development
job.content:
Who you are? 

Are you a Change Champion and Commander?  We are looking for a high caliber who
is highly adaptable to change and good at producing original ideas and are very
comfortable with ambiguity. A candidate who tends to start discussions and move
groups into new areas of exploration, towards the goal.

About the job: 

 * Act as a supervisor to manage daily warehouse operations including but not
   limited to goods receiving, order picking, loading and transportation
 * Monitor stock flow and system information accuracy to maintain warehouse
   shrinkage in an acceptable level
 * Maximize warehouse space utilization by frequently review staff productivity
   and inventory reports
 * Update Standard Operations Procedure (SOP) periodically to maintain a smooth
   and efficient operation flow
 * Support in logistic system development projects to optimize the warehouse
   efficiency

What we look for? 

 * Tertiary education or above in Supply Chain, Logistics Management or related
   disciplines
 * At least 2 years’ experience in warehouse operations and with Retail, FMCG or
   eCommerce exposure is definitely an advantage
 * Analytical, detail-minded and independent
 * Competency in MS Office, especially in Word, Excel and PowerPoint
 * Good command of spoken and written English and Chinese

Don’t miss the chance to join our winning team!

Interested parties please forward your resume with current and expected salary
package to our Company’s email. To be one of US, you can enjoy:

 * Comprehensive Medical and Life insurance coverage, including your spouse and
   children
 * Exclusive company pension schemes
 * Marriage, Maternity and Paternity Leave
 * Exclusive shopping discount, Bazaar Sales for our people only
 * Professional training and career advancement opportunities

We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all qualified
candidates. The information provided will be treated in strict confidence and be
used only for consideration of your application for relevant / similar posts
within the AS Watson Group. All personal data of unsuccessful applicants will be
destroyed within 12 months from the date of application.

bullets: Exposure in offline + online business model

questions: What's your expected monthly basic salary?

paragraphs: PARKnSHOP Supermarket is part of AS Watson Group, the world’s largest international health and beauty retailer operating over 16,500 stores under 12 retail brands in 29 markets, with over 130,000 employees worldwide. For the fiscal year 2023, AS Watson Group recorded revenue of US$23 billion. Every year, it is serving over 5.5 billion shoppers via its O+O (Offline plus Online) platforms, providing tech-enabled retail experience to customers offline and online.
Established in 1972, PARKnSHOP is Hong Kong's leading O+O supermarket chain and one of the most trusted brands in Hong Kong. PARKnSHOP now operates nearly 250 stores in Hong Kong and Macau.

job.title: Senior Business Operation Executive (Operation & Billing)
job.abstract: Our client “⁠⁠⁠China Telecom Global Limited" is seeking a Senior Business Operation Executive (Operation & Billing) to join their company!
job.content:
Our client “⁠⁠⁠China Telecom Global Limited" is seeking a Senior Business
Operation Executive (Operation & Billing) to join their company!

 

 

What you’ll be doing? 

 * Responsible for billing demand analysis, solution providing and successful
   project delivery.
 * Develop billing standards and oversee the development and enhancement of the
   billing system.
 * Design billing process, invoice template and system test for new products.
 * Responsible for gross profit analysis for products or individual customer
   cases, verifying data from billing systems through out the billing process,
   and monitoring anomalies.
 * Plan and conduct billing system and applications training to users.
 * Formulate the operation manuals, policies, and procedures, and conduct
   training to users.
 * Assist on conducting billing data analysis, including efficiency analysis,
   fluctuation analysis, audit data analysis, and AR/AP analysis.

 

 

Who are they looking for? 

 * Bachelor's degree in computer science, IT, or a related data analysis field
   is preferred.
 * Prior work experience in the telecommunications industry is advantageous.
 * Minimum of 2 years of professional experience.
 * Proficiency in programming languages such as SQL, C++, Python, etc.
 * Strong ability to work under pressure, excellent communication,
   organizational, and coordination skills, and a keen sensitivity to data.

 

Why you should consider this opportunity: 

Our client offers an attractive remuneration package with fringe benefits to the
right candidate, such as

 

 * Health Insurance

 

 

 

Working Hour:

 

 * 5 days work week

 

 

 


Ready to join this role? Apply now to submit your resume with date of
availability and expected salary to us!  
 

All information received will be kept in strict confidence and will be treated

job.title: Company Secretarial Assistant
job.abstract:
Responsibilities:
• Assist in preparing Corporate Secretarial documents
• To handle full set of statutory records and statutory filing for our...
job.content:
About us

We are fast growing medium sized CPA firm in Kowloon Bay.





Qualifications & experience



 * • Diploma or Degree. • At least 2 years' experience in medium-sized audit
   firm or corporate services firm. • Proficient in MS Office operations • Good
   command in both written and spoken English and Cantonese • Working knowledge
   in CSA software is an advantage.







Tasks & responsibilities



 * • Assist in preparing Corporate Secretarial documents • To handle full set of
   statutory records and statutory filing for our clients • Responsible for Data
   input • Perform other ad-hoc assignments as required • To handle
   administrative works and courier works related to office







Benefits



 * • 5 days a week • Medical insurance – hospitalization and out-patient cover •
   13th month pay

job.title: (Senior) Segment Manager (Cross Border Business)
job.abstract: Bank of China (Hong Kong) is committed to building a challenging and rewarding work place for employees.
job.content:
Responsibilities

 * Formulate effective cross-border strategies and plans based on management’s
   direction
 * Perform project management from planning to executing different project
   plans, especially for projects in both China and overseas regions, and ensure
   that all projects are implemented on schedule with defined quality standards
 * Assist management to evaluate the results of different cross-border programs,
   prepare relevant reports and proposals with professional recommendations and
   workable solutions for management to improve the overall business
   performance, and to manage cross-border customer segment and drive marketing
   programs to build customer portfolio
 * Liaise with product managers to come up with suitable training materials and
   to make enhancement with feedback from sales team
 * Conduct regular review & analysis on sales performance in order to provide
   advice or suggestion for sales team to improve as well as to achieve the
   targets
 * Ensure all works are complied with internal and external policies and rules

Requirements

 * Degree or above with major in Business Administration, Marketing, Economics,
   Finance or related discipline
 * With 5 years working experience in segment management and business strategy
   management, including 2 years of which in managerial level and retail banking
   business
 * Profound knowledge and experience in Business development / Marketing
   planning
 * Knowledge in projects about China financial industry and experience in China
   project management
 * With good people network in China and ability to communicate with Chinese
   financial entities independently
 * Candidate with less experience will be considered as our Segment Manager

bullets: Ensure all works are complied with internal and external policies and rules
Degree or above with major in Business Administration
With 5 years working experience in segment mgmnt & business strategy management

job.title: IPB, Citigold Relationship Manager
job.abstract: We’re currently looking for a high caliber professional to join our team as IPB,Citigold Relationship Manager (Internal Job Title: Citigold Relatio...
job.content:
Shape your Career with Citi

Wealth brings together the full power of Citi to serve the entire continuum of
wealth clients, from affluent to ultra-high net worth to family offices.The
strategies we create help our clients maintain liquidity while maximizing
yields, transact in foreign currency and across borders, and manage fluctuating
expenses or cash flow. We are uniquely suited to helping our clients meet their
banking needs across regions through our global network.

We’re currently looking for a high caliber professional to join our team as
IPB,Citigold Relationship Manager (Internal Job Title: Citigold Relationship
Banker - C12) based in Hong Kong.  Being part of our team means that we’ll
provide you with the resources to meet your unique needs, empower you to make
healthy decision and manage your financial well-being to help plan for your
future.  For instance:

Citi provides programs and services for your physical and mental well-being
including access to telehealth options, health advocates, confidential
counseling and more. Coverage varies by country.

We empower our employees to manage their financial well-being and help them plan
for the future.

Citi provides access to an array of learning and development resources to help
broaden and deepen your skills and knowledge as your career progresses.

In this role, you’re expected to:

Client Account Management

Review Citigold customer needs and asset allocation, pro-actively engage with
the customer to validate the understanding of the needs in China & Taiwan market

Advise Citigold customers to enrich the relationships by mobilizing additional
funds and sell other fee-based products/services based on the current and future
customer needs.

Review product penetration for the assigned client base, identify potential
Citigold customers who can be sold tailored products to enhance product
penetration

Ensure coverage of all relationships through customer engagements, risk
profiling and financial planning.

Organize Citigold customer events to enhance customer bonding.

Acquire new Citigold customers through converting referral leads.

Compliance, Risk & Controls

Ensure that KYC/AML and other compliance norms are strictly adhered to.

Fulfilling the clients’ necessities while providing an exceptional client
experience is the expected behavior from all our employees and it will be
measured by specific metrics.

Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating
particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup,
its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and
regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding
personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and
reporting control issues with transparency.

As a successful candidate, you’d ideally have the following skills and exposure:

Bachelor's/University degree or equivalent experience

2-5 years relevant experience

Ability to manage relationships both internal and external; Ability to
multi-task

Mandatory certifications as required for selling financial products, i.e. HKSI
Paper 1, 7 & 8 and IIQE 1, 2, 3 & 5

Working at Citi is far more than just a job. A career with us means joining a
family of more than 230,000 dedicated people from around the globe. At Citi,
you’ll have the opportunity to grow your career, give back to your community and
make a real impact.

Take the next step in your career, apply for this role at Citi today

 

------------------------------------------------------

Private Client Coverage

------------------------------------------------------

Job Family:

Relationship Banker

------------------------------------------------------

Time Type:

Full time

------------------------------------------------------

job.title: Head of Sales
job.abstract: Trio Engineering Company Limited is a member of Trio Industrial Electronics Group Limited (Stock code: 1710). We position ourselves as a world...
job.content:
Trio Engineering Company Limited is a member of Trio Industrial Electronics
Group Limited (Stock code: 1710). We position ourselves as a world class
industrial electronics manufacturer, with headquarters in Hong Kong and
production facilities in Guangzhou, the PRC & Rayong, Thailand and Sales office
in Dublin & Waterford, Ireland. To match with our Group’s expansion, we are now
looking for a high caliber candidate to fill the following position.
(Our website: www.trio-ieg.com)


The Job Role:

 * Develop new customers and explore new business and market opportunities for
   our Electronic Manufacturing Services business
 * Have existing client network is a high welcome
 * Manage the full cycle of a business development process
 * Identify and evaluate new business opportunities and alliances to support
   business goals
 * Prepare proposals and presentation materials for client pitching
 * Construct business strategies for long term business growth of new customers.

 Requirements:

 * Degree in Electronics/ Engineering/ Business Administration or related
   discipline
 * Established network within the Electronics Manufacturing Services (EMS)
   industry 
 * Analytical, strategic thinker, resourceful and has good business acumen
 * Possess good knowledge in manufacturing process in Electronics PCBA
 * Good communication and interpersonal skills are essential attributes
 * Travelling is required

We are an equal opportunity employer and committed to workforce diversity with
opportunity for continuous development and growth to all employees.

(All information will be treated in strict confidence and will be used
exclusively for recruitment related purpose only. Information of unsuccessful
applicants will be destroyed upon completion of the recruitment process.)
